metaDescription: Developer whose goal is to create accessible and user-friendly websites.

hero.description: My goal is to create accessible, user-friendly websites with a focus on great user experience, ensuring enjoyment and usability for all.

about.title: About
about.firstParagraph: Hello, my name is Adam. I'm a guy that loves to code and try out new technologies.
about.secondParagraph: Years ago, when I was choosing my educational path, I decided to pick technical school to learn mechatronics. During my time in school, the classes I enjoyed the most were PLC programming classes. Some time later, I earned bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering and started working as a technician. I always wanted to dive deeper into programming world and I decided that maybe good time is now when I am still early in my carreer. Who knows? Maybe I am going to like it and change my planned career path?
about.thirdParagraph: Well, I started learning it in late 2021, and in fact, I do like it. Since then, I've tried few languages and many different technologies and tools. Those are the main ones that I use and have the most proficiency in at this moment:
about.fourthParagraph: However I am constantly following new trends and trying new things to judge if I should update my stack.

projects.title: Projects
projects.remaxPeak: A real estate agency site built from ground up by me with Next.js and Strapi.
